definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

sentences.english: The water swirled about his feet.
"Swirl" is the speed and passion , it is fast and slow , beautiful and dangerous .
sentences.chinese: “漩”是速度，是激情，他時急時緩，美麗又危險。

sentences.english: After water, then roll cast from the swirl of the boat, but right.
sentences.chinese: 經過水漩，則擲薦投之，舟乃無恙。

sentences.english: The lower frequency is associated with decrease of vortex current.
sentences.chinese: 頻率太低，渦漩電流減小，同樣導致攪拌力下降。

definition: stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
variant of 羅睺|罗睺[luo2 hou2]
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
to join jade annuli/fig. to combine two good things
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
concept from Vedic astronomy (Sanskrit Ketu), the opposite point to 羅睺|罗睺[luo2 hou2]/imaginary star presaging disaster
to promote (to official position in former times)
(appears as phonetic ho, especially in words taken from Sanskrit)/half-blind (archaic)
